Meanings: حرف لاتین برای اشباع بودن سازند ازسیال
بدست آمده از نمودار سونیک یا صوتی
Lost time due to Surveying, mis
runs, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
Sand, also commonly write as : sd, but mostly use "s" for small
بوجود آورنده این گلوسری بزبان انگلیسی و فارسی
متولد سال 1344 در اصفهان دارای تحصیلات فوق لیسانس در چینه شناسی و فسیل شناسی از دانشگاه اصفهان
در حال حاضر در شرکت‌های نفتی سمت سنیور ول سایت ژیولوژیست را دارا می‌باشد. جهت تماس با اینجانب با ایمیل درون گلوسری تماس بگیرید
Slip & cut, actions or job's abbreviation which Companymans write in reports
بریدن کابل یا رشته کابلی دراو ورکز
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Show Gas, also write as : SG
نشانه‌های گازی موجود در نمونە حفاری
In the Well , actions or job's abbreviations which Companymans usually write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Safety Meeting, actions or job's abbreviations which Companymans usually write in their daily drilling reports
جلسه ایمنی که در شرکت‌های نفتی ایران معمولا هنگام صبح برگزار می‌گردد
Show Oil, also write as : SO
Space Out, actions or job's abbreviations which Companymans usually write in their daily drilling reports
نشانه‌های نفتی موجود در نمونه‌های حفاری
Sample Tops, Top of Formations which exclaims from samples examination
تاپ‌های اعلام شده سازند‌ها بتوسط بررسی نمودن نمونه‌های حفاری
دو نوع تاپ اعلام شده وجود دارد که دومی تاپ بدست آمده از نمودارها یا لاگ‌های چاه می‌باشد
Unrelated to Casing and making hole, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
A Bearing between the walking beam and the sampson post of a pumping unit
A device used to suspend a rod string after the pump has been spaced or when the weight of the rod string must be taken off the pumping equipment
A measurement of load safety for wire rope obtained by using the following formula: Safety Factor
B = nominal catalog breaking strength of the Wire Rope, and
W = calculated total static load. Also called : Design Factor

An accessory to a fishing tool, placed above it. if the tool cannot be disengaged from the fish, the safety joint permits easy disengagement of the string of pipe above the safety joint. Thus, part of the safety joint and the tool attached to the fish remain in the hole and become part of the Fish
S/M, actions or job's abbreviations which Companymans usually write in their daily drilling reports
جلسه ایمنی که در شرکت‌های نفتی ایران معمولا هنگام صبح برگزار می‌شود
An emergency mechanism component enabling the retrieval of a packer or tubing if stuck

An automatic valve that opens or closes when an abnormal condition occurs e.g., a pressure relief valve on a separator that opens if the pressure exceeds the set point, or the shutdown valve at the wellhead that closes if the line pressure becomes too high or too low
. A valve installed at the top of the drill stem to prevent flow out of the drill pipe if a kick occurs during tripping operations
نمک یا هالیت: که همان Na Cl است

A compound that is formed along with water by the reaction of an add with a base. A common salt table salt is sodium chloride derived by combining hydrochloric add with sodium hydroxide. The result is sodium chloride and water. Another salt is calcium sulfate, obtained when sulfuric acid is combined with Calcium Hydroxide
A drilling mud in which the water has an appreciable amount of salt usually sodium or calcium chloride dissolved in it. Also called saltwater mud or saline drilling fluid
. A mud with a resistivity less than or equal to the formation water resistivity
An influx of Formation salt water into the Well
نمونه‌های سنگهای حفاری شده که از روی شیل شیکر یا الک‌های لرزان بدست می‌آید
Drilling fluid formulated so that it will not alter the properties of the cuttings the fluid carries up the Well
تاپ‌های اعلام شده سازند‌ها بتوسط بررسی نمودن نمونه‌های حفاری
دو نوع تاپ اعلام شده وجود دارد که دومی تاپ بدست آمده از نمودارها یا لاگ‌های چاه می‌باشد
A device attached to pipeline to permit continuous sampling of the oil, gas, or product flowing in the line

The Well Cuttings obtained at designated footage intervals during drilling. From an examination of these cuttings, the geologist determines the type of rock and formations being drilled and estimates oil and gas content
. Small quantities of Well fluids obtained for analysis
s, also mostly write as : sd, use "s" for small
که اندازه آن بین 2 تا 0. 0625 میلیمتر یا 2000 تا 62. 5 میکرون می‌باشد
Any one of several methods by which the loose, unconsolidated grains of a producing formation are made to adhere to prevent a well from producing sand but to permit it to produce oil and gas
The insoluble abrasive solids content of a drilling fluid rejected by a

mesh screen. usually expressed as the percentage bulk volume of sand in a drilling fluid. This test is an elementary type in that the retained solids are not necessarily silica and may not be altogether abrasive. For additional information concerning the kids of solids retained on the
mesh screen, more specific tests would be required. See also : Mesh

any method by which large amounts of Sand in a Sandy Formation are prevented from entering the Well, like : Ahwaz Sandstone . Sand in the Well can cause plugging and premature wear of Well equipments. See also : Gravel Pack, Sand Consolidation, Screen Liner
A device to salvage Casing on a P&A job
tool drilling line, a service machine, or sand line of a rotary rig to drill up tools, remove downhole debris, and so on
A sSreen Joint placed opposite perforations in sand control
ماسه ای که دارای نشانه‌های نفتی می‌باشد
A kind of Sedimentary rock formed from Sand
sized grains, 0.0025– 0.08 inch, or 0.0625 –2 mm in diameter. The spaces between grains may be empty or filled with either a chemical cement of Silica or Calcium Carbonate or a fine

grained matrix of Silt and Clay particles. The principal mineral constituents of the grain framework are Quartz, Feldspar, and rock fragments. Sandstones are quarried for use as building stone. Because of their abundance, diversity, and mineralogy, Sandstones are also important to geologists as indicators of erosional and depositional processes. See also graywake
یک سنگ رسوبی که از دانه‌های سیلیس تشکیل شده و سیمان آن معمولا سیلیس
اکسید آهن و غیره است. ماسه سنگها معمولا محتمل‌ترین محل جهت تجمع نفت و آب هستند
Sst, also sometimes write as : Ss

A detrital, Sedimentary rock composed of individual grains of Sand commonly Quartz that are cemented together by Silica, Calcium Carbonate, Iron Oxide, and so on. Sandstones are common rocks in which Petroleum and water accumulate

A Sedimentary rock composed of individual mineral grains of rock fragments between 1/16 and 2 millimeters in diameter and cemented together by Silica, Calcite, Iron Oxide, and so forth. Sandstone is commonly porous and permeable and therefore a likely type of rock in which to find a Petroleum reservoir
sdy, also rarely write as : sy
A device made up in the Drill Stem to absorb much of the wear between frequently broken joints, as the Kelly and Drill Pipe
sub rounded, also mostly write as : sub rndd
تست یا آزمایش میزان سیمان موجود در محل پاشنە لوله‌های جداری رانده شده
یک سوراخ کننده تیوبینگ قابل بازیابی
لوازم یا ابزار کنترل کنندە مواد جامد موجود در گل حفاری

One of the pioneer companies in electric well logging, named for the French scientist who first developed the method. Today, many companies provide logging services of all kinds. Pronounced Slumberjay
A device used to clean deposits of Paraffin from Tubing or flow lines, See also : Pig or Rabbit

A device that is fastened to the outside of casing to remove mud cake from the wall of a hole to condition the hole for cementing. By rotating or moving the casing string up and down as it is being run into the hole, the scratcher, formed of stiff wire, removes the cake so that the cement can bond solidly to the Formation

Determination of the relative percentages of substances, e.g., the suspended solids in a drilling fluid that pass through or are retained on a sequence of screens of decreasing mesh size. Also called : Sieve analysis
A pipe that is perforated and often arranged with a wire wrapping to act as a sieve to prevent or minimize the entry of sand particles into the Well. Also called : a Screen Pipe
SEISMIC DISPLAY BOND LOG, Log Curve name
SPECTRAL DENSITY LOG/WITH PE INDEX, Log Curve name
SONIC DIGITAL TOOL, Log Curve name
Sealing members at the production tubing for landing inside the Packer's Seal bore
Any of various materials, such as mica flakes or walnut hulls, that cure lost circulation. See : Lost Circulation, Lost Circulation Material
A special class of saltwater muds in which sea water is used as the fluid phase
Any cementing operation after the primary cementing operation. Secondary cementing includes a plug
back job, in which a plug of cement is positioned at a specific point in the well and allowed to set. Wells are plugged to shut off bottom water or to reduce the depth of the Well for other reasons
A unit of viscosity as measured with a Marsh funnel according to API procedure. See : API RP 13B, Marsh Funnel Viscosity
آسیاب اشره ای لولە جداره ای
SIX ELECTRO DIPMETER, Log Curve name
An exploration method in which strong low

frequency sound waves are generated on the surface or in the water to find subsurface rock structures that may contain Hydrocarbons. The sound waves travel through the layers of the earth's crust; however, at Formation boundaries some of the waves are reflected back to the surface where sensitive detectors pick them up. Reflections from shallow Formations arrive at the surface sooner than reflections from deep Formations, and since the reflections are recorded, a record of the depth and configuration of the various Formations can be generated. Interpretation of the record can reveal possible Hydrocarbon
An Offshore Drilling Rig, usually with a large hull. It has a mat or legs that are lowered to the sea
floor and a main deck that is raised above the surface of the water to a distance where it will not be affected by the waves. Also called : Jackup Drilling Rig
زمین شناس ارشد مقیم در محل چاه
The Formation of stable Calcium, Magnesium, Iron complex by treating water or Mud with certain complex Phosphates
A Well drilled or completed for the purpose of supporting production in an existing field
To place stands of drill pipe and drill collars in a vertical position to one side of the rotary table in the derrick or mast of a drilling or workover rig. Compare also with : Lay Down Pipe
To run and cement casing at a certain depth in the wellbore. Sometimes called : Set Pipe
A tool used to set drillable or permanent tools, such as : Packers, Retainers, Plugs; can be Mechanical, Electric, or Hydraulic
SPECTRAL GAMMA RAY, Log Curve name
حالت ظاهر آن مانند دانه‌های شکر است
سنگی رسوبی که از رس تشکیل شده و اندازە دانه‌ها در حد کلی می‌باشند و دارای حالت ورقه ای هستند
The mud tank adjacent to the shake shaker, usually the first tank in to which mud flows after returning from the hole. Also called : Shaker Pit
سنگی رسوبی که از رس تشکیل شده و اندازە دانه‌ها در حد کلی می‌باشند و دارای حالت ورقه ای هستند
grained sedimentary rock composed mostly of consolidated Clay or Mud. Shale is the most frequently occurring sedimentary rock

A vibrating screen used to remove cuttings from the circulating fluid in rotary drilling operations. The size of the openings in the screen should be carefully selected to be the smallest size possible that will allow 100 percent flow of the fluid. Also called : Shaker
A relatively small container of high explosive that is loaded into a perforating gun. On detonation, the charge releases a small, high
velocity stream of particles a jet that penetrates the Casing, Cement, and Formation. See also : Perforating Gun
SHDT DUAL DIPMETER LOG, Log Curve name

The component in a blowout preventer that cuts, or shears, through drill pipe and forms a seal against well pressure. Shear rams are used in floating offshore drilling operations to provide a quick method of moving the rig away from the hole when there is no time to trip the drill stem out of the hole
A device placed at the end of or beneath an object for various purposes, e.g.: Casing Shoe, Guide Shoe
تست یا آزمایش مربوط به میزان سیمان در پاشنه یا کفشک لوله‌های جداری
To explode nitroglycerine or other high explosives in a hole to shatter the rock and increase the flow of Oil, now largely replaced by Formation fracturing
. In seismographic work, to discharge explosives to create vibrations in the earth's cruse. See also : Seismograph
گازی که در هنگام لوله بالای کوتاه یا تریپ کوتاه آزاد می‌شود
The displacing of Well fluids from the Annulus up the Tubing

A charge of high explosive, usually nitroglycerine, detonated in a Well to shatter the Formation and expedite the recovery of Oil. Shooting has been almost completely replaced by Formation Fracturing and Acid Treatments
. A point at which a photograph is made in a single
shot survey. See also : Directional Survey
The appearance of Oil or Gas in Cuttings, Samples, or Cores from a drilling Well
نمونه یا سیال حفاری دارای نشانه گازی
نمونه یا سیال حفاری دارای نشانه نفتی
SO & G, also use this abbreviation : SO&G
نمونه یا سیال حفاری دارای نشانه نفت و گاز
SO & W, also use this abbreviation : SO&W
نمونه یا سیال حفاری دارای نشانه نفت و آب
SO&G, also use this abbreviation : SO & G
نمونه یا سیال حفاری دارای نشانه نفت و گاز
SO&W, also use this abbreviation : SO & W
نمونه یا سیال حفاری دارای نشانه نفت و آب
بستن چاه بمنظور انجام عملیات مختلف
بستن چاه بمنظور انجام عملیات تعمیری
In the Well, also write as : SI, actions or job's abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
بستن دهانە چاه بمنظور انجام عملیات مختلف
To close values on a Well so that it stops producing; said of a Well on which the valves are closed
Pressure of the Annular fluid on the Casing at the surface when a Well is shut in
SI BHP, The pressure at the bottom of a well when the surface valves on the Well are completely closed. It is caused by Formation fluids at the bottom of the Well
فشار ته چاه بهنگام بسته بودن دهانە چاه
A bottomhole pressure test that measures pressure after the well has been shut in for a specified period of time. See BottomHole Pressure Test
SI CP, Pressure of the Annular fluid on the Casing at the surface when a Well is shut in
فشار کیسینگ بهنگام بسته بودن دهانە چاه
فشار چاه در هنگام بسته بودن دهانە چاه
Pressure at the top of a Well when it is shut in
Siltstone use this abbreviation rarely , also write as : Stst or Slst
یک سنگ رسوبی که از دانه‌های در اندازه کلی درست شده و جنس ذرات رس می‌باشد
فشار ته چاه بهنگام بسته بودن دهانە چاه

Siamak Bahrami , the Author of this Glossary, born on 1966 in Esfahan, Iran Middle East . Got his B.Sc. from Kerman University on 1989, also got his M.Sc. from Esfahan University on 1996 in the field of MicroPalaeontology & Stratigraphy, and later got his job as geologist in different Mines @ Yazd province and since 2002 works as Senior Wellsite Geologist in NIOC, OMV Iran onshore, Parspetro Zagros Oil Company and Iranrazi Oil Services. Now works in Sinopec International Petroleum E&P Corporation
بوجود آورنده این گلوسری به دو زبان انگلیسی و فارسی

در حال حاضر در ایران زندگی کرده و ایرانی الاصل می‌باشم. متولد سال 1344 در اصفهان دارای تحصیلات فوق لیسانس در رشته چینه شناسی و فسیل شناسی از دانشگاه اصفهان. من در حال حاضر در شرکت سینوپک در زمینه اکتشاف نفت و گاز سمت زمین شناس عملیاتی را دارا می‌باشم. جهت تماس با اینجانب و ارسال پیشنهادات خود با ایمیلی که در گلوسری ذکر شده تماس بگیرید
رسی که اندازه‌های آن در حد سیلت بوده و نیز از ذرات سیلت بسیاری تشکیل شده است
فشار کیسینگ بهنگام بسته بودن دهانە چاه
wall Sub in the production string for placing gas lift Valves, and so on
تخلخل بدست آمده دیواره چاه بتوسط نمودار نوترون
نمونه‌های سازند گرفته شده از دیواره‌های چاه
To use a Whipstock, Turbodrill, or other Mud Motor to drill around broken drill pipe or Casing that has become lodged permanently in the hole

A Coring technique in which Core samples are obtained from the hole wall in a zone that has already been drilled. A hollow bullet is fired into the Formation wall to capture the Core and then retrieved on a flexible steel cable. Core samples of this type usually range from ¾ to
/16 inches 20 to 30 millimeters in diameter and from ¾ to 4 inches 20 to 100 millimeters in length. This method is especially useful in soft
Pressure of the Annular fluid on the Casing at the surface when a Well is shut in
The determination of the percentage of particles that pass through several screens of graduated fineness
Silica, Any of the forms of Silicon Dioxide SiO₂ , including Quartz, Tridymite, Cristobalite, Coesite, Stishovite, Melanophlogite, Lechatelierite, and Chalcedony
Silica, Any of the forms of Silicon Dioxide SiO₂ , including Quartz, Tridymite, Cristobalite, Coesite, Stishovite, Melanophlogite, Lechatelierite, and Chalcedony
دانه هایی در اندازه سیلت یا بین 62. 5 تا 4 میکرون
St, also write as : Sl or Slt
Material that exhibits little or no swelling and whose particle size generally falls between 2 μ and API sand size, or 74 μ
mesh A certain portion of dispersed clays and barite for the most part also fall into this same particle
Slst, also write as : Stst or rarely as : Sltst
یک سنگ رسوبی که از دانه‌های در اندازه کلی درست شده و جنس ذرات رس می‌باشد
Sltst, this abbreviation use rarely, mostly write as : Slst or Stst
دارای حالت سیلتی و با اندازه دانه هایی در اندازه 62. 5 تا 4 میکرون
رسی که اندازه‌های آن در حد سیلت بوده و نیز از ذرات سیلت بسیاری تشکیل شده است
A joint of drill pipe. Compare also with : Double, Thribble, and Fourable
Used to describe Packers with one slip system for supporting weight and pressure from above only
servicing unit whose mast consists of but one steel tube, usually about 65 feet long
A heavy weight or bar placed on or near a lightweight wireline tool. The bar provides weight so that the tool will lower properly into the Well

Sinopec, or the China Petroleum & Chemical Corporation, NYSE: SNP , is one of the most famous & major petroleum industry companies in China. Sinopec's business includes oil & gas exploration, refining, drilling, Mud logging Services & marketing; production & sales of petrochemicals, chemical fibers, chemical fertilizers, and other chemical products; storage & pipeline transportation of Crude Oil & Natural Gas; import, export & import/export agency business of Crude Oil, Natural Gas, refined Oil products, petrochemicals, and other chemicals. In 2006, it is ranked 23rd by Fortune Global 500, in 2006, up from its rank of 31 in 2005. In 2005 it ranked first in the Top 500 Enterprises of China ranking
شرکت اکتشافی و تولیدی نفت چین موسسه با مسیولیت محدود
یک شرکت دولتی چینی در امر نفت و گاز بوده که در تمامی شاخه‌های صنعت نفت و گاز و همچنین در بخش بالا دستی نفت و گاز مشغول فعالیت می‌باشد
فشار چاه بهنگام بسته بودن دهانە آن

Sinopec, or the China Petroleum & Chemical Corporation, NYSE: SNP , is one of the most famous & major petroleum industry companies in China. Sinopec's business includes oil & gas exploration, refining, drilling, Mud logging Services & marketing; production & sales of petrochemicals, chemical fibers, chemical fertilizers, and other chemical products; storage & pipeline transportation of Crude Oil & Natural Gas; import, export & import/export agency business of Crude Oil, Natural Gas, refined Oil products, petrochemicals, and other chemicals. In 2006, it is ranked 23rd by Fortune Global 500, in 2006, up from its rank of 31 in 2005. In 2005 it ranked first in the Top 500 Enterprises of China ranking
یک شرکت دولتی چینی در امر نفت و گاز بوده که در تمامی شاخه‌های صنعت نفت و گاز و همچنین در بخش بالا دستی نفت و گاز مشغول فعالیت می‌باشد
شرکت اکتشافی و تولیدی نفت چین موسسه با مسیولیت محدود

یک شرکت دولتی چینی در امر نفت و گاز بوده که در تمامی شاخه‌های صنعت نفت و گاز و همچنین در بخش بالا دستی نفت و گاز مشغول فعالیت می‌باشد. مولف این گلوسری نیز از سال 2010 تا سال 2012 در این شرکت در پروژە یادآوران بعنوان زمین شناس عملیات مشغول بکار بوده است

Sinopec, One of branches of China Petroleum & Chemical Corporation, NYSE: SNP , which is one of the most famous & major petroleum industry companies in China. Sinopec's business includes oil & gas exploration, refining, drilling, Mud logging Services & marketing; production & sales of petrochemicals, chemical fibers, chemical fertilizers, and other chemical products; storage & pipeline transportation of Crude Oil & Natural Gas; import, export & import/export agency business of Crude Oil, Natural Gas, refined Oil products, petrochemicals, and other chemicals. In 2006, it is ranked 23rd by Fortune Global 500, in 2006, up from its rank of 31 in 2005. In 2005 it ranked first in the Top 500 Enterprises of China ranking

Sinopec, or the China Petroleum & Chemical Corporation, NYSE: SNP , is one of the most famous & major petroleum industry companies in China. Sinopec's business includes oil & gas exploration, refining, drilling, Mud logging Services & marketing; production & sales of petrochemicals, chemical fibers, chemical fertilizers, and other chemical products; storage & pipeline transportation of Crude Oil & Natural Gas; import, export & import/export agency business of Crude Oil, Natural Gas, refined Oil products, petrochemicals, and other chemicals. In 2006, it is ranked 23rd by Fortune Global 500, in 2006, up from its rank of 31 in 2005. In 2005 it ranked first in the Top 500 Enterprises of China ranking
متوقف شدن عملیات حفاری در ماسه
A low platform mounted on the bottom of equipment for ease of moving, hauling, or storing
The area of the formation that is damaged because of the invasion of foreign substances into the exposed section of the formation adjacent to the wellbore during drilling and completion

. The pressure drop from the outer limits of drainage to the wellbore caused by the relatively thin veneer or skin of the affected formation. Skin is expressed in dimensionless units: a positive value denotes formation damage; a negative value indicate improvement. Also called skin effect
A Mast on a Well servicing unit that utilizes a split traveling block and crown block, which makes it possible to pull
slightly, also write as : sly or slgtly
To lower a load or ease up on a line
به آهستگی پایین آوردن مته به ته چاه و اضافه نمودن وزن روی رشته حفاری
A Valve in the bottom of a Retainer. See also : Wireline
slightly, also write commonly as : sly or sl

A special device placed in a string of tubing that can be operated by a wireline tool to open or close orifices to permit circulation between the tubing and the annulus. It may also be used to open or shut off production from various intervals in a well. Also called : Circulation Sleeve
وجود نشانه‌های نفتی مرده بمیزان کم
slgtly, also commonly write as : sl or sly

Drilling in which the size of the hole is smaller than the conventional hole diameter for a given depth. This decrease in hole size enables the operator to run smaller Casing, thereby lessening the cost of Completion. See also : Miniaturized Completion
rope loop for use in lifting heavy equipment
S/C, actions or job's abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
S/C, actions or job's abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
A device in a rotary table or other tool into which tubing, drill pipe, or slips can be inserted
A conducting ring that gives current to or receives current from the brushes in a generator or motor
A singular component of an entire slip system
shaped toothed pieces of metal that fit inside a bowl and are used to support tubing or other pipe
اندازه گیری طول لوله‌های حفاری در هنگام لوله بالا یا پایین
in NIOC refer to as : String Length Measurement
در شرکت ملی حفاری ایران بعنوان اندازه گیری طول استرینگ یا رشتە حفاری به آن اشاره می‌گردد
Siltstone, also rarely write as : Stst
سیلت استون: سنگی که از سیلت تشکیل شده باشد و ذرات آن بین 0. 004 تا 0. 062 میلیمتر است
Siltstone rarely use this abbreviation , also commonly write as : Stst or Slst
سیلت استون: سنگی که از سیلت تشکیل شده باشد و ذرات آن بین 0. 004 تا 0. 062 میلیمتر است

To pump a quantity of heavy mud into the drill pipe. Before hoisting drill pipe, it is desirable if possible to pump into its top section a quantity of heavy mud a slug that causes the level of the fluid to remain below the rig floor so that the crew members and the rig floor are not contaminated with the fluid when stands are broken out
In drilling, a plastic mixture of Cement and water that is pumped into a Well to harden. There it supports the Casing and provides a seal in the Well to prevent migration of underground fluids
. A mixture in which solids are suspended in a liquid
The old term for a Mud Pit. See also : Mud Pit
some, rarely write for small, mostly use "s" for small
smth, also refer to as : smo
A Sheave or Pulley that can be opened up for putting a line over the roller or sheave
Side wall Neutron Porosity, Tool or Log
ابزار یا لاگ جهت محاسبه تخلخل دیوارە چاه بدست آمده از نمودار نوترون
SIDEWALL NEUTRON POROSITY, Log Curve name
To force pipe or tools into a high

pressure well that has not been killed i.e., to run pipe or tools into the well against pressure when the weight of pipe is not great enough to force the pipe through the BOPs . Snubbing usually requires an array of wireline bocks and wire rope that forces the pipe or tools into the well through a stripper head or blowout preventer until the weight of the string is sufficient to overcome the lifting effect of the well pressure on the pipe in the preventer. In workover operations, snubbing is usually accomplished by using hydraulic power to force the pipe through the stripping head or blowout preventer
. To tie up short with a line
A device that mechanically or hydraulically forces pipe or tools into the well against pressure
. A device within some hooks that acts as a shock absorber in eliminating the bouncing action of pipe as it is picked up
Show Oil & Gas, also write as : SO&G
Show Oil & Water, also write as : SO&W
نمونه‌های دارای نشانه‌های نفتی و آب
Show Oil & Gas, also write as : SO & G
Show Oil & Water, also write as : SO & W
One of the alkali metal elements with a valence of 1, an atomic number of about 23. Numerous Sodium compounds are used as additives to drilling fluids
Special class of inhibited chemical muds using as their bases Sodium Silicate, Salt, Water, and Clay
Control operations, closing the BOP's with the Choke and HCR, or fail
safe, Valves open. Compare also with : Hard Shut
SCE, actions or job's abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
ابزار کنترل مواد جامد موجود در گل حفاری
A Logging Tool assembly, especially the device in the logging assembly that senses and transmits Formation data
A type of Acoustic Log that records the travel time of sounds through objects, Cement, or Formation rocks. Often used to determine whether voids exist in the Cement behind the Casing in a Well
زمان مورد نیاز جهت عبور صوت در سنگ
Δt, symbol for Sonic Transit Time
Oil containing Hydrogen Sulfide or another acid gas
Gas containing an appreciable quantity of Hydrogen Sulfide and/or Mercaptans
به آهستگی پایین آوردن مته به ته چاه و اضافه نمودن وزن روی رشته حفاری
SCOPE PICTURE ANALYSIS, Log Curve name
S/O, actions or job's abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
The act of ensuring that a pipe ram preventer will not close on a drill pipe tool joint when the drill stem is stationary. A pup joint is made up in the drill string to lengthen it sufficiently
The joint of drill pipe that is used in hang
off operations so that no tool joint is opposite a set of preventer Rams
A Clamp used to hold the Rod String in pumping position when the Well is in the final stages of being put back on the pump
Position the correct number of feet or joints of pipe from the packer to the surface tree, or from the rig floor to the stack
اسپاد نمودن دکل یا برپایی دکل حفاری بمنظور شروع عملیات حفاری

A Fishing Tool used to retrieve pipe lost in a Well. The Spear is lowered down the hole and into the lost pipe. When Weight, Torque, or both are applied to the string to which the Spear is attached, the Slips in the Spear expand and tightly grip the inside of the wall of the lost pipe. Then the string, spear, and lost pipe are pulled to the surface
spkd, spotted, also write as : spkld
speed traveling block, which permits one elevator to pick up stands as they are broken out while the traveling bock continues to move
A circular steel device that holds slips supporting a suspended string of drill pipe, casing, or tubing. A spider may be split or solid

shaped chain used to spin up tighten one joint of drill pipe into another. One end of the chain is attached to the tongs, another end to the spinning cathead, and the third end left free. The free end is wrapped around the tool joint, and the cathead pulls the chain off the joint, causing the joint to spin rapidly and tighten up. After the free end of the chain is pulled off the joint, the tongs are secured in the spot vacated by the chain and continued pull on the chain and thus on the tongs by the cathead makes up the joint to final tightness
A helically shaped gripping mechanism that is fitted into an overshot to retrieve fish from the Borehole. See also : Grapple
speckled, with spots, spotted, also write as : spkld
نمونه حفاری که از روی شیل شیکر یا الک‌های لرزان گرفته می‌شود
تعداد ضربه در دقیقه پمپ‌های گل
One of the natural electrical characteristics exhibited by a Formation as measured by a Logging Tool lowered into the Well. Also called : Self Potential or SP

The total length of as manufactured Coiled Tubing product, which is placed either on the service or shipping Reel for storage and/or transport. A spool may contain one or more Coiled Tubing "Strings". See also Tubing Head Spool
The Drawworks Drum. Also a CasingHead or Drilling Spool. To wind around a Drum

Pumping a designated quantity of a substance, e.g. acid or cement into a specific interval inside the Well. For example, 10 bbl of LCM Pill may be spotted around an area inside Hole, in which there is Loss and to control this Mud Loss
تزریق مواد مختلف در عمق خاصی از چاه

To pump a designated quantity of a substance, such as Acid or Cement into a specific interval in the Well. For example, 10 barrels of Diesel Oil may be spotted around an area in the hole in which Drill Collars are stuck against the wall of the hole in an effort to free the Collars
تزریق نمودن موادی خاص در عمق معیینی از چاه
The pumping of a substance such as oil into an interval in the Well
actuated metal band or ring ferrule used to expand a Liner Patch when making casing repairs. See also : Liner Patch
تزریق مواد مختلف در عمق خاصی از چاه
تزریق نمودن موادی خاص در عمق معیینی از چاه

spotted, Pumping a designated quantity of a substance, e.g. acid or cement into a specific interval inside the Well. For example, 10 bbl of LCM Pill may be spotted around an area inside Hole, in which there is Loss and to control this Mud Loss

To move the drill stem up and down in the hole over a short distance without rotation. Careless execution of this operation creates pressure surges that can cause a Formation to break down, resulting in lost circulation
. To force a Wireline Tool or Tubing down the hole by using a reciprocating motion
. To begin drilling a Well; i.e., to spud in
To begin drilling; to start the hole
The fluid used when drilling starts at the surface, often a thick Bentonite
اسپاد نمودن دکل یا برپایی دکل حفاری بمنظور شروع عملیات حفاری
tool drilling rig, sometimes mounted on a truck or trailer
The initial Loss of Mud solids by filtration, making Formations easier to drill. See also : Filtration Loss
A cementing operation in which cement is pumped behind the casing under high pressure to recement channeled areas or to block off an uncementred zone
. The increasing of external pressure on a diver's body caused by improper diving technique

The forcing of cement slurry by pressure to specified points in a well to cause seals at the points of squeeze. It is a secondary cementing method that is used to isolate a producing formation, seal off water, repair casing leaks, and so forth
servicing activity whereby a Cement slurry is pumped into open Perfs, Split Casing, etc., to effect a blockage
A drillable service Packer, a Retainer
SEISMIC REFERENCE SURVEY, Log Curve name
SEISMIC REFERENCE SURVEY, Log Curve name
SIGNAL TO RECEIVER TIME, Log Curve name
Time actually spent for Surveying a well while not drilling, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
SPINNER SURVEY/SPINNER LOG/SPINNER FLOW METER, Log Curve name
A Clastic rock composed of particles that range in diameter from 1/16 to 2 millimeters in diameter. Sandstones make up about 25% of all Sedimentary rocks
Sandstone, also mostly write as : Sst
یک سنگ رسوبی که از دانه‌های سیلیس تشکیل شده و سیمان آن معمولا سیلیس
اکسید آهن و غیره است. ماسه سنگها معمولا محتمل‌ترین محل جهت تجمع نفت و آب هستند
subsea, the values are always negative
ارتفاع نقطه یا محلی زیر سطح دریا
که معمولا مقدار آن منفی است
نمونه‌های حفاری حاوی مقدار کمی نشانه هایی از نفت مرده
گاهی در مورد سیال حفاری نیز بکار می‌رود
نمونه‌های حفاری حاوی مقدار کمی نشانه نفتی
Sandstone, also sometimes write as : Ss
یک سنگ رسوبی که از دانه‌های سیلیس تشکیل شده و سیمان آن معمولا سیلیس
اکسید آهن و غیره است. ماسه سنگها معمولا محتمل‌ترین محل جهت تجمع نفت و آب هستند
دانه هایی در اندازە سیلت که بین 62. 5 تا 4 میکرون می‌باشند
To guide the end of a pipe into a coupling when making up a connection

A tool placed on a drill collar near the bit that is used, depending on where it is placed, either to maintain a particular hole angle or to change the angle by controlling the location of the contact point between the hole and the collars. See packed
. A vessel in which hydrocarbon vapors are separated from liquids
. A fractionation system that reduces the vapor pressure so that the resulting liquid is less volatile
A vertical arrangement of blowout prevention equipment. Also called preventer stack. See also : Blow
like installation that is the waste disposal system for unwanted vapor such as flue gases or tail
To store a drilling rig on completion of a job when the rig is to be withdrawn from operation for a time
sleeve ported Casing section used in stage cementing
The placement of compressors, pumps, cooling systems, treating systems, and so forth, in a series with another unit or units of like design to improve operating efficiency and results

The connected joints of Pipes racked in the Derrick or Mast during a Trip. The usual Stand is about 90 feet long about 27 meters , which is three lengths of Drill Pipe screwed together, See also : a Thribble
A vertical pipe rising along the side of the derrick or mast, which joins the discharge line leading from the mud pump to the rotary hose and through which mud is pumped going into the hole

The connected joints of Pipe racked in the Derrick or Mast, when making a Trip. On a Rig, the usual stand is 90 ft long three lengths of Pipe screwed together or a thribble. Compare double and fourble
جویینت‌های متصل شده لوله‌های حفاری که طول آن برابر 90 فوت می‌باشد که از 3 جویینت تشکیل شده است
A complex Carbohydrate sometimes added to drilling fluids to reduce filtration loss
جویینت‌های متصل شده لوله‌های حفاری که طول آن برابر 90 فوت می‌باشد که از 3 جویینت تشکیل شده است

A method of improved recovery in which steam is injected into a reservoir through injection wells and driven toward production wells. The steam reduces the viscosity of crude off, causing it to flow more freely. The heat vaporizes lighter hydrocarbons; as they move ahead of the steam, they cool and condense into liquids that dissolve and displace crude oil The steam provides additional gas drive. This method is used to recover viscous oils. Also called : Continuous Steam Injection or Steam Flooding
Salt of Stearic Acid that is a saturated,

carbon fatty Acid. Certain compounds, such as Aluminum Stearate, Calcium Stearate, Zinc Stearate, have been used in drilling fluids for one or more of the following purposes: Defoamer, Lubrication, Air Drilling in which a small amount of water is encountered
خط کشی از جنس فولاد که جهت اندازه گیری طول لوله‌های حفاری بکار می‌رود
گازی که در هنگام لوله بالای کوتاه یا تریپ کوتاه آزاد می‌شود
Any process undertaken to enlarge old channels or to create new ones in the producing Formation of a Well, e.g. : Acidizing or Formation Fracturing

A cylindrical or tubular projection, relatively small in diameter, that extends below a downhole tool and helps to guide the tool to a designated spot such as into the center of a portion of stuck pipe
. A device for guiding pipe and lowering it to the water bottom as it is being laid down by a lay barge. It is hinged to permit adjustments in the angle of pipe launch
The lowering of pipe or tubing into the bore of a downhole tool
Lost time due to Pipe Stuck, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
متوقف نمودن عملیات حفاری درون ماسه
mandrel service squeeze tool with on
off tool used in drilling operations during storm interruptions
A retrievable tool used to suspend drilling temporarily during a storm offshore

Two Packers separated by a spacer of variable length. A Straddle Packer may be used to isolate sections of open hole to be treated or tested or to isolate certain areas of perforated Casing from the rest of the perforated section
strky, with lines exist on the surface of the rock
The electrokinetic portion of the spontaneous potential electric
log curve that can be influenced significantly by the characteristics of the filtrate and mud cake or the drilling fluid that was used to drill the Well
An explosive method utilizing primacord, which is an instantaneous textile

covered fuse with a core of very high explosive. It is used to create an explosive jar inside stuck drill pipe or tubing so that the pipe may be backed off at the joint immediately above where it is stuck
To thread the drilling line through the sheaves of the crown block and traveling block. One end of the line is secured to the hoisting drum and the other to the derrick substructure
To pull rods and tubing from a well at the same time. Tubing must be "stripped" over the rods a joint at a time
A Well nearing depletion that produces a very small amount of oil or gas, usually ten barrels per day or less
. A column wherein absorbed constituents are stripped from absorption off. The term is applicable to columns using a stripping medium, such as steam or gas
A blowout prevention device consisting of a gland and packing arrangement bolted to the wellhead. It is often used to seal the annular space between tubing and casing
A rubber disk surrounding drill pipe or tubing that removes mud as the pipe is brought out of the hole
sealing element of a stripper blowout preventer. See also : Stripper Head
The process of lowering the drill stem into the Well when the Well is shut in on a Kick and when the weight of the drill stem is sufficient to overcome the force of Well pressure
. The process of putting tubing into a well under pressure
The process of raising the drill stem out of the wellbore when the well is shut in on a kick
. The process of removing tubing from the well under pressure

All the operation necessary for preparation and Side Tracking from an existing well. Starts from setting cement plug till drill a new hole Formation, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
streaky, with lines exist on the surface of the cuttings or rock
تعداد ضربه در دقیقه پمپ‌های گل
To have rigged up wire rope and sheaves or blocks for hoisting
Siltstone, also write as : Slst or Sltst
یک سنگ رسوبی که از دانه‌های در اندازه کلی درست شده و جنس ذرات رس می‌باشد

Drill Pipe, Drill Collars, Casing, or Tubing that has inadvertently become immovable in the hole. Sticking may occur when drilling is in progress, when Casing is being run in the hole, or when the Drill Pipe is being hoisted
The depth in the hole at which the drill stem, tubing, or casing is stuck

A device that prevents leakage along a piston, rod, propeller shaft, or other moving part that passes through a hole in a cylinder or vessel. It consists of a box or chamber made by enlarging the hole and a gland containing compressed packing. On a well being artificially lifted by means of a sucker rod pump, the polished rod operates through a stuffing box, preventing escape of oil and diverting it into a side outlet to which is connected the flow line leading to the oil and gas separator or to the field storage tank. For a bottomhole pressure test, the wireline goes through a stuffing box and lubricator, allowing the gauge to be raised and lowered against well pressure. The lubricator provides a pressure
tight grease seal in the stuffing box
دارای حالت سیلتی و با اندازه دانه هایی در اندازه 62. 5 تا 4 میکرون

A short, threaded piece of pipe used to adapt parts of the drilling string that cannot otherwise be screwed together because of differences in thread size or design. A sub i.e., a substitute may also perform a special function. Lifting subs are used with drill collars to provide a shoulder to fit the drill pipe elevators; a kelly saver sub is placed between the drill pipe and the kelly to prevent excessive thread wear of the kelly and drill pipe threads, a bent sub is used when drilling a directional hole

A short, threaded piece of Pipe used to adapt parts of the Drill Stem that otherwise cannot be screwed together because of differences in thread size or design. 2. A threaded device made up in the Drill Stem that serves some special purpose. see Junk Sub, Bent Sub, Bumper Sub, Lifting Nipple, Saver Sub, and Kelly Saver Sub
ابزاری که برای عملیات‌های مختلف درساق مته استفاده میشود

An offshore drilling structure that has several compartments that are flooded to cause the structure to submerge and rest on the ocean floor. Of necessity, most submersible rigs are used only in shallow waters

An Offshore Drilling Structure that has several compartments which are flooded to cause the structure to submerge and rest on the ocean floor. Of necessity, most submersible rigs are used only in shallow waters
ss, always is negative in values
که معمولا بصورت عدد منفی بیان می‌کردد
Also called a Suction Tank, Pump Pit, or Mud Suction Pit. See also : Suction Tank
The mud tank from which mud is picked up by the suction of the mud pumps. Also called : a Suction Pit
sug, also rarely write as : sgry
A squeeze cement job with open perfs above the Packer

The first string of casing after the conductor pipe that is set in a well. it varies in length from a few hundred to several thousand feet. Some states require a minimum length to protect freshwater sands. Compare also with : Conductor Pipe
A drilling mud prepared by adding a surfactant to a water
base mud to change the colloidal state of the clay from that of complete dispersion to one of controlled flocculation. Such muds were originally designed for use in deep, high
temperature wells, but their many advantages high chemical and thermal stability, minimum swelling effect on clay
bearing zones, lower plastic viscosity, and so on extend their applicability
The flux of fluids and solids that occurs in the initial stages of any filtration before pore openings are bridged and a filter cake is formed. Also called : Spurt Loss
A rapid increase in pressure downhole that occurs when the drill stem is lowered too fast or when the mud pump is brought up to speed after starting
SUV, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
انجام ارزیابی جهت اندازه گیری شیب چاه و یا سایر پارامتر ها
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Suspension, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد

All operations necessary to perfrom the temporary abandoning of the Well : from starting of Run In Hole of the string DP, Wire Line & Coiled Tubing for the positioning of the first plug cement, bridge, Etc. . or running a casing, to end of operation, Operations' abbreviation which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
SUS, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
معمولا اختصار این لغت در مورد عملیاتی بکار میرود که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
Survey, operations' abbreviations which usually Companymans write in their daily drilling reports
اختصار در مورد عملیاتی است که در حال انجام است و در گزارش‌ها مورد استفاده قرار می‌گیرد
SEISMIC VELOCITY SURVEY, Log Curve name

faced cylinder mounted on a hollow Mandrel with a pin joint on the upper end to connect to the swab line. A check Valve that opens upward on the lower end provides a way to remove the fluid from the Well when pressure is insufficient to support flow. to operate a Swab on a Wireline to bring Well Fluids to the surface when the Well does not flow naturally. Swabbing is a temporary operation to determine whether or not the Well can be made to flow. If the Well does not flow after being swabbed, a pump is installed as a permanent lifting device to bring the Oil to the surface

faced cylinder mounted on a hollow mandrel with a pin joint on the upper end to connect to the swab line. A check valve that opens upward on the lower end provides a way to remove the fluid from the well when pressure is insufrficien5t to support flow

v: 1. To operate a swab on a wireline to bring well fluids to the surface when the w4ell does not flow naturally. Swabbing is a temporary operation to determine whether the well can be made to flow. If the well does not flow after being swabbed, a pump is installed a a permanent lifting device to bring the oil to the surface
. To pull formation fluids into a wellbore by raising the drill stem at a rate that reduces the hydrostatic pressure of the drilling mud below the Bit
A tool used to straighten damaged or collapsed Casing in a Well
Oil containing little or no Sulfur, especially little or no Hydrogen Sulfide

A rotary tool that is hung from the rotary hook and traveling block to suspend the drill stem and to permit it to rotate freely. it also provides a connection fore the rotary hose and a passageway of the flow of drilling fluid into the drill stem
نمونه‌های حفاری گرفته شده از دیوارە چاه
SIDEWALL SAMPLE RECORD/SDWLL CORNG/CORE GUN/CST, Log Curve name
Sacks, of mud additives or anything else
Sandy, also mostly write as : sdy
